trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação segura e interoperável que suporta segurança federada.

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple systems for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: Federação é a capacidade de compartilhar identidades entre vários sistemas de autenticação e autorização.

trans-unit.source: These identities can refer to users or to machines.
trans-unit.target: Essas identidades podem referir-se a usuários ou computadores.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support exclusively using transport security.
trans-unit.target: HTTP federado dá suporte à segurança SOAP, bem como a segurança de modo misto, mas ele não oferece suporte ao uso exclusivamente a segurança de transporte.

trans-unit.source: This binding provides [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] support for the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: Essa associação fornece [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] suporte para o protocolo WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Serviços configurados com essa associação devem usar o transporte HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Bindings consist of a stack of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: Associações consistem em uma pilha de elementos de associação.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in WSFederationHttpBinding is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: A pilha de elementos de associação em WSFederationHttpBinding é o mesmo que contidos em <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>é definido como o valor padrão de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding controls the details of the message security settings, the values of which are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O WSFederationHttpBinding controla os detalhes das configurações de segurança de mensagem, os valores que estão disponíveis da instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>que é retornado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding also provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> property to set and retrieve the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: O WSFederationHttpBinding também fornece um <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>propriedade para definir e recuperar o URI no qual o aviso de privacidade está localizado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contains the `establishSecurityContext` attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao chamar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço criado com [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] de um aplicativo de cliente WCF criado com [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] ou anterior, o arquivo de configuração gerado svcutil.exe ou adicionando uma referência de serviço do [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contém o `establishSecurityContext` atributo na configuração de associação.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application throws an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext ".
trans-unit.target: Esse atributo não é reconhecido pelo [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] tempo de execução e o aplicativo gera um <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>com a mensagem "establishSecurityContext de atributo não reconhecido".</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the `establishSecurityContext` attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Para solucionar esse problema, remova o `establishSecurityContext` atributo da configuração de associação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os detalhes dessas configurações estão disponíveis da instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>que é retornado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo de segurança usado pela associação especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>é <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>que especifica que a autenticação integridade, confidencialidade e o servidor e cliente são fornecidos usando a segurança de mensagem SOAP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os detalhes dessas configurações estão disponíveis da instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>que é retornado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com uma associação especificada por seu nome de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da configuração de associação para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de associação com o nome configurationName não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo específico de segurança usado pela associação e um valor que indica se uma sessão confiável está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma sessão confiável está ativada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma coleção com os elementos de associação para a associação.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements depends on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> set.
trans-unit.target: A pilha de elementos de associação depende do valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>definida.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: A pilha de elementos de associação <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>é o mesmo que contidos em <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>é definido como o valor padrão de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> However, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> results in a stack that is something of a hybrid between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> bindings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>Entretanto, a configuração <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>para <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>resulta em uma pilha que é de uma combinação entre a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>associações.</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement> Finally, using the MTOM encoder looks exactly the same as for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>Por fim, usando o codificador MTOM parece exatamente da mesma maneira que <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that makes up the binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> do tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>que compõe a associação.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>que tiver habilitado uma sessão confiável.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>que tiver habilitado uma sessão confiável.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o elemento de associação de transporte de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>da associação atual.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URI no qual o aviso de privacidade está localizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>no qual o aviso de privacidade está localizado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de versão do aviso de privacidade para a associação.

trans-unit.source: The version number of the privacy notice.
trans-unit.target: O número de versão do aviso de privacidade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de segurança usada com essa associação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> that specifies the mode of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"> </xref> que especifica o modo de segurança usada com essa associação.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> for this binding is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> para essa associação é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão e deve ser serializada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>o valor da propriedade deve ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>
